  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AutoRefreshAgent
    Runnable agent that periodically triggers an inbox refresh.
    DeleteEmailTask
    Task for deleting an email from the server and updating the UI.
    DownloadEmailTask
    Task for downloading the full email content to a local file.
    EmailSenderTask
    Task for sending an email in a separate thread.
    LoadContentTask
    Task for loading the content of a specific email.
    RefreshInboxTask
    Task for refreshing the email inbox.
    ToggleReadStatusTask
    Task for toggling the read/unread status of an email on the server.
